text: RoboDK is an offline programming and simulation software for industrial robots. The simulation software can be used for many manufacturing projects including milling, welding, pick and place, packaging and labelling, palletizing, painting, robot calibration and more. == Main Features == === Robot Brand Independence === RoboDK has a library of over 500 robots from more than 50 different manufacturers including ABB, Fanuc, Kuka, Motoman , Hwashi Robots and Universal Robots. === User Interface === The user interface enables easy simulation and doesn't require any previous programming knowledge. == File Format == Different types of files can be imported including step and iges files. RoboDK post processors allow for programs to be exported to an actual robot including, ABB Rapid (mod/prg), Fanuc LS (LS/TP), Kuka KRC/IIWA (SRC/java), Motoman Inform (JBI), Universal Robots (urscript), Hwashi(C＋＋) , Kavasaki(Python and C＋＋)and more. == References == ==External links== * Category:Simulation software Category:Robotics simulation software Category:Simulation programming languages Category:Industrial robotics
title: RoboDK
